name: UI/UX Improvements Based on Critique
goal: Enhance the user interface based on geography game best practices

prds.description: Collapsible game panel with toggle button
prds.rationale: Primary content is the map; UI should not crowd the view
steps: Add toggle button to collapse/expand the game panel

prds.description: Enhanced submit button with disabled state until county selected
prds.rationale: Confirm button should only be active after a selection is made
steps: Enable only when valid county is typed or selected from autocomplete
Visual pulse/glow effect to draw attention when ready
prds.automatedTest: P8.2 - Submit button has ready state logic

prds.description: Polyline visual connecting guessed county to target after game ends
prds.rationale: Provides instant spatial learning by showing the relationship
steps: After game ends (loss), draw line from last guess centroid to target centroid
Color code: green if close, red if far

prds.rationale: Power users prefer hotkeys over mouse movement
steps: Escape key closes modals and autocomplete
Keyboard shortcuts shown in help modal

prds.rationale: Red/green colorblindness is common; provide shape-based alternatives
steps: Add settings toggle for 'High Contrast Mode'
In high contrast: use patterns/shapes instead of just colors

prds.rationale: Clean, minimalist Wordle-inspired aesthetic with legible fonts
prds.manualTest: Tabular nums CSS added to guess-distance, stat-value, countdown-time

prds.description: Semantic color system refinement with warning states
prds.rationale: Consistent color meanings across the UI
steps: Warning colors added to CSS variables
prds.manualTest: Warning state animations on guess slots

prds.rationale: New users need guidance on how to play
steps: Tutorial overlay shown on first visit
Explains game mechanics with numbered steps
How to Play button in header

prds.rationale: Keep vital stats in corners, avoid blocking map interaction
steps: Current layout keeps stats in side panel
Panel can be collapsed to give full map view

prds.rationale: Wordle-style shareable grid for social sharing
steps: Score and URL in share text
prds.note: Already implemented in Phase 7, format matches Wordle style
